ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:0.5_0: 56. The training rule on monasteries without monks
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:1.2_0: On one occasion a number of nuns who had completed the rainy-season residence in a village monastery.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:1.4_0: “Venerables, where did you spend the rains residence?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:1.5_0: We hope the instruction was effective?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:1.7_0: So how could the instruction be effective?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:1.8_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:1.9_0: “How can nuns spend the rains residence in a monastery without monks?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:1.10_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:1.14_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:1.15_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:1.16.1_0: ‘If a nun spends the rainy-season residence in a monastery without monks, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.1.6_0: she is not able to go to the instruction or to formal meetings of the community.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.1.7_0: If she thinks, “I’ll stay here for the rainy-season residence,” and she prepares a dwelling, sets out water for drinking and water for washing, and sweeps the precincts, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.1.8_0: At dawn, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.2.2_0: if the monks who entered the rainy-season residence there depart or disrobe or die or join another faction;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.2.3_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.2.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.2.6_0: The sixth rule, the training rule on fire, is finished.
